name: Mr. Hoot Amigurumi Owl Pattern
description:
Amy Gaines has gained a worldwide reputation for designing these very cute crochet toys.

Amigurumi (ah-mee-guh-roo-mee) is the Japanese art of
knitting or crocheting small stuffed animals.

The paper pattern you receive includes instructions to make Amy Gaines original Crochet Mr Hoot Owl. These patterns are very simple and includes lots of photos to help you out.

Materials you will need to complete this project: 

Worsted weight yarn / 8 ply yarn
size 3mm crochet hook
stuffing1 pair- black 9.oo mm safety eyes
yarn needle

Contact us for more information.

name: Christmas Ornament Crochet Pattern
description:
Merry Christmas!!!
Amy Gaines has gained a worldwide reputation for designing these very cute crochet toys.

Amigurumi (ah-mee-guh-roo-mee) is the Japanese art of
knitting or crocheting small stuffed animals.

The paper pattern you receive includes instructions to make Amy Gaines original Crochet Patterns. These patterns are very simple and includes lots of photos to help you out.

Pattern includes instructions for the following ornaments: Santa, Elf, Gingerbread House, Reindeer, Bird in a nest, Raccoon, Bunny, Squirrel, Hedgehog, Mushroom House, and Acorn

Measurements not including the loop:
Santa: 6 inches tall
Elf: 5.5 inches tall
Gingerbread House: 5 inches tall and 3.5 inches wide
Reindeer: 6 inches tall
Bird in a nest: 3 inches tall and 3.5 inches wide
Raccoon: 4.5 inches tall
Bunny: 6 inches tall
Squirrel: 5 inches tall
Hedgehog: 4 inches long
Mushroom House: 3 inches tall
Acorn: 2 inches long
Materials:
8ply yarn
3mm or 3.5mm crochet hooks
stuffing
6mm black safety eyes
Blush and Cotton Swabs
Pom-Poms- handmade or store bought
Yarn Needle

Free offer One pair of size 6 mm black safety eyes.

Contact us for more information.
